divs: sighting detailsi was alone in our truck heading to tempe from our home in scottsdale to see a movie with a niece. i stopped at a stop sign when i saw what appeared like a shooting star fly very fast in front of me going from the east to the southwest. i just thought it was a shooting star but it was unusually large and very bright. as i headed southwest on a small street i checked my watch as i was running late for an 8pm movie. it was 7:21pm. i again looked up and in front of me just in the middle of the crescent moon i saw what i thought was a shooting star seemingly turn into an object with varying, pulsating colors. it came to a sudden stop as if it was targeting that very spot. then it hovered in front of what appeared to be a small airplane headed southbound. i thought the plane was going to crash into the object, but instead it looked like it dropped altitude quickly to avoid a collision. all this time the bright pulsating, blue, yellow, orange and red with white lights object hovered in front of the plane or what looked like in the planes path. i didn't see the plane again until it reappeared and seemed to be zig zagging away from the object in a southbound direction. it was a clear, cloudless evening and you could see the object with it's continuous strobe, pulsating lights just hover for at least a minute or so. then the object suddenly did a 45% degree turn and took off toward the east. it then stopped near or just below a "star"; possibly venus. it hovered there several seconds; still with the strobe and pulsating lights then took off toward the east; in the same direction it had come. i was so startled! i didn't have my camera and couldn't find my blackberry long enough to try for a picture. it happened so fast. during this entire viewing of this object i was weaving in and out of traffic and traversing from lane to lane trying to keep an eye on it. i briefly lost a few seconds of contact view when i had to go under a freeway underpass. but as soon as i made contact view again i kept an eye on it. the funny thing is my husband said i left the house at exactly 7:20pm. he said he told me to be careful with traffic as i was rushing around and i was trying to make the 8pm movie in tempe with my niece. but when i called my niece and told her about this sighting, she asked me to be careful with traffic and asked me where i was...i said i was at the freeway 101 and chaparral approximately 15 miles from where i live. but when i looked at my watch (a new s\w); it was only 7:22!! i didn't realize that according to my watch this whole even took only 1 minute until when i returned home later that evening after the movie and my husband asked me what time this all took place and i said about 7:22pm. he told me what time i called him and told me to look at my blackberry to see what time i called my niece and it was at 7:22pm. that was even more startling! i have not ever seen anything like this. my immediate family understood. then yesterday evening my husband said he saw an article about a ufo in a local phoenix newspaper so i read it and listened to the video clip and it sounds and is described by others as i had witnessed it. the rest of the evening i was feeling very confused; couldn't recall most of the movie and kept losing things. something normally i don't do. i hope this helps. thank you for your time. attached is my sketch; drawn to the best of my recollection.
Summary: UFO flew from east to west across sky like a falling star. Hovered, blocked plane path, made 45% turn, hovered, took off northeast.
